a.title: High School End of Course Testing Information
a.span: High School End of Course Testing Information

li.a: High School End of Course Testing Information

p.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;

br.p:
We continue to work with students that are having issues with their laptops not connecting to the internet. The issue is with an update that is not installing properly on some student laptops.
We have been contacting students and will continue contacting students to resolve the problem.
The technology office can be reached at 419-395-1111 at the recording enter 503 to speak to Mr. Liebrecht or 504 to speak with Mr. Sheridan.
We can also be reached by sending an email to helpdesk@ayersvillelsd.gethelphss.com.

p.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); letter-spacing: normal;

div.p: Updates and information regarding district and instructional planning during this time of school closure can be found using the COVID-19 link in the main menu bar above or by clicking here.
